summary: This simple mesh mod finishes adding the glows from Daedric Armor WINTER Retexture by ScarletR8 to all the Daedric weapons and armor pieces for both male and female. It can be used with any Daedric retexture mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][img]http://i.imgur.com/XlGN7HY.jpg[/img]
[color=#a4c2f4][size=5]Introduction:[/size][/color]

This simple mesh mod finishes adding the glows from Daedric Armor WINTER Retexture by ScarletR8 to all the Daedric weapons and armor pieces for both male and female. It can be used with any Daedric retexture mod.

[color=#a4c2f4]It is based on the glows from:[/color]

Daedric Armor WINTER Retexture by ScarletR8
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15492/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15492/?[/url]

[color=#a4c2f4]And also:[/color]

Daedric Glows - New and Enhanced Colors by Zaronios
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60127/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60127/?
[/url]
Please check those mods out.

[color=#a4c2f4][size=5]Optionally:[/size][/color]

I have also included both the WINTER Blue and frost glow meshes. You can use either or mix and match.

The shield and weapon textures featured in my screen shots come from:

White and Black Daedric weapons and armor retex by allzero
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11678/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11678/?
[/url]
Please check that out as well if you wish to fill in the weapon and shield texture gaps left from the WINTER retexture mod by ScarletR8.

[color=#a4c2f4][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color]

Just drop the data folder into your Skyrim installation folder and overwrite.
author: wtfthis
